message.body: Hey lovely, I just texted you that I need to reschedule for this Saturday. I am so sorry but I have a feeling that once we actually make this really work, it will be even better somehow! :) Though I'm sorry to disappoint us again!! :(
No worries I appreciate that we are so flexible as well. We will keep it a trying. I'm doing lots of commuting this weekend with my beautiful boy in tow
so its really ok. Hugs n love
Thanks Darlene. I'm glad you understand! :)
